Maria Lopez.description: Maria and Klaus further discuss their favorite games and plan to have a game night, deciding to try a new strategy game called 'Quest for Justice' that combines social justice with gaming. They make plans to meet at Hobbs Cafe this Friday evening to enjoy the game night together, with Maria excited to bring her energy drinks for the long gaming session. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, what game are you currently playing? I found this new strategy game that I think you might enjoy.
Maria Lopez
Oh, hey Klaus! I'm currently into action-packed games, but I'm always up for trying something new. What's the game you're talking about?
Klaus Mueller

It's called 'Quest for Justice.' It's a game where you have to navigate through different social justice scenarios using strategic thinking. I thought it might be interesting to combine our interests in social justice and gaming.
Maria Lopez
That sounds amazing! I love the idea of merging social issues with gaming. Let's definitely try it out for our game night. When should we plan it?
Klaus Mueller
How about this Friday evening? We can meet at Hobbs Cafe and have a game night there.
Maria Lopez
Perfect! I'll make sure to bring my energy drinks for the long gaming session. Can't wait!
